fullText: Frank Langella delivers a performance of such towering integrity and quiet power that it transforms Robert Bolt's somewhat static play into a riveting examination of conscience versus convenience.
dtliExcerpt: Frank Langella delivers a performance of such towering integrity and quiet power that it transforms Robert Bolt's somewhat static play into a riveting examination of conscience versus convenience.
